before_last_planet: ^With Megalith Golem defeated, you prepare to leave this planet behind. The people wave goodbye, their faces a mix of sadness and hope. As you board your ship, you can see the devastation that once plagued this world starting to heal.
^?" your navigator asks as the engines hum to life.
^You bring up the star map, the next destination glowing with an ominous red light. "We set course for the Red Planet," you reply. "There’s no time to waste."
^The ship lifts off, leaving the recovering planet behind as you set your sights on the next challenge.
